    Cardiac Rehab Finder

    less than 1 minute read

    Allows you to find the closest cardiac rehab centres in Victoria to a given address

    Why did I make this?

    Currently, the easiest way to find the closest cardiac rehab centre involves looking up a patientâ€™s address, looking at a physical map(!) with the cardiac rehab centres marked, and picking the one that looks the closest.

    I wrote this so that it would be easier to find the closest one without having to do all these steps.
